reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 496/97: RESERVE FOR WORKING FUNDS LIMIT

content.content: 1. The maximum amount that a district school board may provide for a reserve for working funds for the period January 1, 1998 to August 31, 1998 is 5 per cent of the amount estimated by the board as its revenue fund expenditures for the period January 1, 1998 to August 31, 1998. O. Reg. 496/97, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. The maximum amount that a district school board may provide for a reserve for working funds for the period January 1, 1998 to August 31, 1998 is 5 per cent of the amount estimated by the board as its revenue fund expenditures for the period January 1, 1998 to August 31, 1998. O. Reg. 496/97, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 496/97, s. 2. Français
content.raw_html:
2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 496/97, s. 2.
